env HOME=$WORK/home

benchinit -r -benchtime=10x .
stdout '^BenchmarkInit'

-- go.mod --
module test.tld/foo
-- import.go --
package foo

import (
	// these cause issues. 
	_ "runtime"
	_ "testing"

	// these surprisingly don't. perhaps we need better tests.
	_ "unsafe"
	"sync"
	_ "sync/atomic"
	_ "errors"
	_ "io"
	_ "runtime/debug"
	_ "runtime/pprof"
	_ "runtime/trace"
	_ "time"
	_ "syscall"
	_ "os"
)

var (
	fooOnce sync.Once
	foo     bool
)

func init() {
	fooOnce.Do(func() { foo = true })
}
